message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great deal, considering the product's worth to you is $1200000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product at such a price. However, I am hoping to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $850000? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $950000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to you is $1200000. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go any lower than this.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value to me and my budget constraints, I would like to propose an offer of $925000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while staying within my financial limits.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $975000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's worth to you is $1200000. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm open to finalizing the deal.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $960000. I hope this proposal is acceptable and allows us to finalize the deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $975000. I've already made significant concessions, and I need to ensure I get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers and propose a new price of $972500. This is my final offer, and I hope you can accept it.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $965000. I hope this proposal is acceptable and allows us to finalize the deal.
